text:
@emirates @EmiratesSupport 
I travelled on 31st March from Mum to Dubai in EK507. Had some excess luggage for which I paid, need to know can I get some proof or ref regarding my excess luggage payment? Boarding pass with receipt has been lost hence any support I can receive?

@AmericanAir How about helping us understand when 4162 will
Depart   It’s like clockwork  every flight delayed
@Lu_Lu619 Traveling can get you fired, 4 hours, plus her flight got delayed by HOURS.
Orlando International Airport Delayed Flight. https://t.co/QWdhUivQKN https://t.co/Eo5I1psb3x

@klm Just received a call from someone claiming to be “Merlin James” KM25307CS regarding compensation for lost baggage. He told me to download an app called WorldRemit—this sounds like a scam. Is this your process? If not, why is someone impersonating your staff?

@MAS  MH714 from Bali to BOM via Malaysia is a nightmare. Delayed from 12:55PM to 1:20PM, stuck at Singapore since 3PM (now 8:50PM!) due to engine issues. Connecting flight to BOM also delayed. No clear updates, no help. We have emergencies! UNACCEPTABLE

@RavenHaven01 @danglishly @BenZeisloft @RonFilipkowski Americans cannot comment on any other countries when their own children can't even go to school without fear of being gunned down. Multiple nations across the world now issue travel warnings for your "great" country.

Greetings from CVG, this week's work adventure requires a couple of flights...we're off to a roaring start with my 1st flight delayed 1 hour and 35 minutes 🙄...what is my final destination? https://t.co/krijDjfLwV
@BoeNYCxxx @Hotstuff91 Check out the airline policy for lost luggage, the airline workers won’t tell you your rights, but if u can find it in their policies, u should come out on top
@tinman197474747 @RSE_VB My delayed initial flight and short layover would disagree.
@repetitionofdeg Don't know but all depends if the flight is delayed even more

@makemytrip my singapore visa application is pending since 27th March 2025 and your customer care officials are not able to resolve the issue. The process was delayed from your end. My travel date is 13th April. Request urgent attention to the matter.

@SMoabj73723 @Lay105606016708 @_HalfBrain_ @FearedBuck Still racist like the ppl in Argentina it’s not a Chinese issue it’s a global issue. He’s kind enough to share his platform and make the ppl travel and experience the culture through the streams those few ppl should be ashamed.
@GordonMcmat6340 I feel you, it’s like waiting for a delayed flight. I once binge-watched a whole series while waiting for an update. Snacks definitely help the time pass.

@AlanMoore84 We're very sorry that you've had this experience, Alan. We'll pass on your comments but if you'd like to discuss this further, please complete the following form with your contact details: https://t.co/WhaP4Ex1vf GM

@DDC2 The alternative is swallowing up land currently used for other purposes (food, energy, travel, recreation, goods production and storage etc) to continue low density devt where ‘devs and other vested interests….’ etc
Demand is an issue currently ignored.
@repetitionofdeg My 2 hour 10 min. Layover has now become 90 minutes with flight now delayed til 11:22 A

✈️ What’s a few flights and long layovers when God’s got your back like a trusty travel pillow? Isn’t it a little ironic that the best insights often come while waiting for a delayed flight, as if the universe is saying, “Take a breather and reflect”? With humility and gratitude, https://t.co/HUl8js8mzP
